component.name: OpenXcom
component.summary: Open-source clone of the popular UFO - Enemy Unknown videogame

description.p: OpenXcom is an open-source clone of the original UFO: Enemy Unknown (X-Com: UFO Defense in USA), licensed under the GPL and written in C++ / SDL. It was originally founded by SupSuper in February 2010, and has since grown into a small development team surrounded by a very supporting community.
